languages.text: {n}Нэми безуспешно пытается влепить ей подзатыльник.{/n} "Ты бы хоть перед Лорд-капитаном постеснялась! Годы воспитания зря, никакого уважения к старшим".
{n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."
languages.original_text: {n}Нэми безуспешно пытается влепить ей подзатыльник.{/n} "Ты бы хоть перед Лорд-капитаном постеснялась! Годы воспитания зря, никакого уважения к старшим".

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her.{/n} "You should at least be embarrassed in front of the Lord Captain! Years of training wasted, you have no respect for your elders."
{n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her.{/n} "You should at least be embarrassed in front of the Lord Captain! Years of training wasted, you have no respect for your elders."
{n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least be embarrassed in front of the Lord Captain! Years of training wasted, and you have no respect for your elders."

{n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."
{n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."

languages.text: {n}Nemi versucht vergeblich, ihr auf den Kopf zu schlagen.{/n} "Du könntest dich wenigstens vor dem Lord Captain benehmen! Es scheint ja fast so, als hätte ich dich keinen Respekt vor dem Alter gelehrt."
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemi versucht vergeblich, ihr auf den Kopf zu schlagen.{/n} "Du könntest dich wenigstens vor dem Lord Captain benehmen! Es scheint ja fast so, als hätte ich dich keinen Respekt vor dem Alter gelehrt."

languages.text: {n}Nemi tente de lui donner un tape derrière le crâne, en vain.{/n} « Tu pourrais au moins essayer de te tenir devant {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ! Après, on va croire que je t'ai jamais appris à respecter tes aînés. »
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemi tente de lui donner un tape derrière le crâne, en vain.{/n} « Tu pourrais au moins essayer de te tenir devant {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ! Après, on va croire que je t'ai jamais appris à respecter tes aînés. »

languages.text: {n}Nemi intenta en vano darle una colleja.{/n} «¡Por lo menos compórtate como es debido delante {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán! Cualquiera diría que no te he enseñado a respetar a tus mayores».
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nemi intenta en vano darle una colleja.{/n} «¡Por lo menos compórtate como es debido delante {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán! Cualquiera diría que no te he enseñado a respetar a tus mayores».

languages.text: {n}ネミは彼女の頭をひっぱたこうとして失敗する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンの前でぐらい礼儀正しくしなさいよ！これじゃ、まるで私があなたに年長者を敬うように教えなかったみたいじゃない」
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."

traits.locale_text: {n}ネミは彼女の頭をひっぱたこうとして失敗する。{/n}「ロード・キャプテンの前でぐらい礼儀正しくしなさいよ！これじゃ、まるで私があなたに年長者を敬うように教えなかったみたいじゃない」

languages.text: {n}涅米想要打米娅的头，但没有打到。{/n}“你至少可以在舰长大人面前放规矩点！你这个样子，就好像我从来没教过你要尊重长辈一样。”
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."

traits.locale_text: {n}涅米想要打米娅的头，但没有打到。{/n}“你至少可以在舰长大人面前放规矩点！你这个样子，就好像我从来没教过你要尊重长辈一样。”

languages.text: {n}Nemi, kafasına bir tane indirmeye çalışsa da başaramıyor.{/n} "En azından Lord Kaptan'ın huzurunda kendine çekidüzen verebilirsin! Sanki sana büyüklerine hürmet etmeyi öğretmemişim gibi davranıyorsun."
languages.original_text: {n}Nemi tries unsuccessfully to slap her upside the head.{/n} "You could at least behave in front of the Lord Captain! It's like I never taught you to respect your elders."
